DOC.brief_summary: A study to assess the safety, tolerability and efficacy of NVA237 versus placebo in patients with moderate-to-severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD).
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Safety, Tolerability and Efficacy of NVA237 Versus Placebo

Patients who have had a lower respiratory tract infection within 6 weeks prior to Visit 1 2. Patients with concomitant pulmonary disease 3. Patients with a history of asthma 4. Patients with a known history and diagnosis of alpha1 antitrypsin deficiency 7. Patients in the active phase of a supervised pulmonary rehabilitation program 8.
